participant_1.background:
I'm glad the weather is getting warmer so I can spend more time outside playing soccer.
I work at a coffee shop to support myself while I pursue my dream of becoming a famous actress.
I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.
i am a student.
I like to experiment with different hairstyles and makeup looks on my days off.

participant_2.background:
I grew up in the Midwest where I learned to love folk metal.
i love my pet dog more than anything.
I am a movie buff who has a passion for collecting memorabilia from my favorite films.
I'm happy with my weight and would love to have lunch with Quentin Tarantino.
i m the middle child of 3 siblings.

content.text: Hey there, what's up?
Not much, just watching the movie Midsommar. It's a bit creepy but I'm enjoying it.
Oh, I've heard good things about that movie. What's it about?
It's about a group of friends who go to Sweden for a midsummer festival and things start to get weird.
That sounds interesting. I might have to check it out.
You should! It's definitely a unique film.
What are some of your other favorite movies?
I love all kinds of movies, but I'm especially a fan of horror and sci-fi.
Me too! I love a good scare.
I just saw the new Godzilla movie and it was awesome!
I've been wanting to see that!
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I'm sure I will.
What about you? What are some of your favorite movies?
I love The Princess Bride, The Breakfast Club, and The Lord of the Rings trilogy.
The Princess Bride is a classic! I love that movie.
Me too! It's so funny and heartwarming.
I've never seen The Breakfast Club. Is it good?
It's one of my favorite coming-of-age movies. It's about five high school students who are brought together for detention one day and they learn a lot about each other.
That sounds interesting. I'll have to check it out.
You should! I think you'd like it.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
